# Government Tender Announcement

## Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna and Electrical Installation at the Audet, Quebec Site

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 2023223296/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-23T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Reference Number:** cb-635-69865983

### Requirements

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires construction services for the installation of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency antennas including electrical work at a Audet, Quebec site. This is a first phase (Phase one) of a two-phase competition: the first phase will pre-qualify bidders based on mandatory requirements as per the attached Invitation to Tender (ITT); second phase (Phase two) will invite the qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project based on specifications and drawings.

### Tender Documents

* [Attachment: Construction ITT – 21516](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21516/construction-itt-2023223296-two-phase-audet_0_0.pdf)
* [Attachment: Construction IS – 2023223296](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21516/construction-is-2023223296-a-deux-phases-audet_0.pdf)

### Evaluation Criteria

* Mandatory Requirements Evaluation
* Financial Bid Evaluation

### Security Requirements

* The Contractor must perform and complete the Work by February 16th, 2024.
* There is a security requirement associated with this ITT.

### Site Visit

* Manditory Site Visit will be held during Phase two.

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Charles Langlois
* **Email:** Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (514) 348-7156

### Important Notes

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Indigenous businesses are encouraged to participate in the procurement process.
